head: China Semantic Web Expert Ning Hu Joins Ontology Network
author: ont

newslist.content: Hu is one of the first Semantic Web professionals in China. In 2008, he joined The Halo Project, initiated by Paul Allen, Co-Founder of Microsoft, where his contributions included big data, artificial intelligence, and work related to the Semantic Web. He is also a senior expert in IT infrastructure and integrated architecture.

In 2013, Hu took part in setting up the China division of Green Dot. His experience also includes banking finance, prepaid card services, enterprise resource planning, digitization of government affairs, gaming platforms, and media streaming.

Hu joins Ontology Network’s 30+ strong technical team as Senior Protocol Architect. We look forward to his contributions to the project! Ontology Network’s complete team page will be online very soon for all to see.
